From: "Lord Bigglesby" <tevildoii@...>

Hi. I'm back... it's been real wacky out my way for about the past 
two months. I've changed colleges (now I'm at a place where I have 
real influence and people are cool) and swapped through half a dozen 
jobs... People have been loading all sorts of RPGs on me to see how 
good I really am, and the main game I'm involved in (Two Towers, 
www.angband.com/towers) has had a lot of political upheaval. 
Yesterday my girlfriend sent me a nasty email saying that we're 
through... and an old friend of mine has had to move into my place 
for legal reasons. Like I said, it's been wacky. But now that my 
sister's wedding and all that other nonsense is taken care of I 
should be able to pay more attention to this stuff. Can anyone sum up 
exactly what is going on, and what is desired from me? I'm certainly 
open for scenario design and plot outlining. The coding is outside my 
expertise. Gotta slide...
     -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
